Mmph! That was quick...

[Thinking] I see he slightly favors the right. That wont work. A misdirection appears to be the way to go.

**Starts the sequence with a quick cutter on the right side with the left hand**
dodges and quickly counters by grabbing the offending arm, catching Xannari off balance and forcing her to be flipped into the air and landing hard on the ground.

> 
> dodges and quickly counters by grabbing the offending arm, catching Xannari off balance and forcing her to be flipped into the air and landing hard on the ground.

[You control your movements]

[Thinking] As expected...

**Quickly uses the open arm to let a narrow jab into just above the left ankle, which if I understand physics correctly, causes it to lift up because of how linked forces work with hinges**

\*Rumble\*

(you're not so bad yourself, for an amateur)

\*grunts, but instead of going off balance quickly uses the new momentum to make a round-house kick
Suddenly, on research post Epsilon, the reactor goes critical and 30 of my best scientists die.

[sees movements with enhanced visual acuity, and plans out what to do]

**Pulls right leg inward, and pushes the left leg outward, causing her to fall to the ground to the right side.**

Bold move... [get it?]

**While stopping your interia, she lunges her right leg out slightly, flips onto her back, and starts a counter-clockwise spin with her left leg. On the next rotation, she extends her right leg outward and goes in for a hard, precise kick, in the left kneecap, pushing it left.**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

Come on, 7 more centimeters!
\*grabs knee\* AURGH! not bad!

What can I say? Precision.

**Performs 3 rolls away from Sampa, using her interia to pick it up into 3 cartwheels, then for a grand jump up, while performing 3 flips, landing on her feet, then bowing**
I bet you did not account for me getting back up and fighting on an injury did you? \*begins to slowly rise and put pressure on the injured leg\*
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EIG9pBuvKuE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
What's wrong, Xannari, you were so quick to try and commit genocide and yet you can't even keep an old, injured captain down in hand-to-hand combat? you disappoint me...

You're one to talk. You're a captain of a fleet, designed for extending your reaches beyond the confines of your little world, fight in wars, and you can't keep up with little ol' me? You said it yourself; I'm an amateur.

Also, what fun is this if I don't give you a chance?

And you claim to be a champion?

\*Rumble\*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T21:43:41Z" title="07/13/2015 09:43  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

and yet, here I am, coming here to complete one final mission before I lose my commission to a court martial, which you so deftly orchestrated... and you still can't seem to put this old dog out of its misery...

You talk of my own redemption back at the fleet, yet you refuse your own? I'll get you your little ship back and you can go away, if you have the courage to walk away right now, admit defeat, and never come near the Great Attractor again.

Or, you can move 4 centimeters to the left.

At this point, there is no other way to redeem myself for the personal failure, of NOT being able to get you and keep you behind bars, it's all over for me in the fleet, they have already decided that I committed treason! I know how Court Martials work, I sat on many such proceedings myself. Once you receive a summons for one as the defendant, you are already guilty! The ONLY way I will be able to redeem myself is to finally put you away!

Then damn it, lock me up already! What are you waiting for!? Standing right here, arms open and waiting to be defeated! Get off the ground and show me what you're made of!

Or are you too weak... Is that it? Well, sorry for asking you to try. I'll just get back to work then, and you can leave.

and you know the reason I placed the Attractor system under full quarantine? It was my token for peace with you. We were trying to appease your wish to keep it safe, and yet you knowingly assault a citadel ship and caused the citadel to be destroyed. ALL for an illusion that we were to harm the attractor. Every action I have taken has been to do what I could to protect it, WITHOUT resorting to the genocide of millions

- - - Updated - - -

\*takes up side arm, but instead of pointing it at Xannari, points it at himself\* I'm sorry... \*fires\*

Wrong! I heard the comms! You were going to study it! Getting near it was well over the line in the first place. It is my lord! No one else's!

- - - Updated - - -

Wait! ...
Maybe he missed his head
\*hears only faint voices\* on my face you can only see what looks like a faint smile...
Dangit! NOOO!

Nooooo Sampa

- - - Updated - - -

I quickly inject him with nans
Rush him to a med bay!

Damn it! Shuttle computer, re-route your command functions here quickly! Project a steady stream of Verterons at Sampa to mesh out all excess energy! Lace it with 22 kilohertz of raw power!

I'm not letting you die! You stubborn thing... Computer, add in a mix of Gnyacine reactants, narrowest band, and project it at his brain! Hopefully that should slowly eradicate memory...

Now pulses of 25 megahertz at 122 BPM. That should pump his heart.

Execute commands!

I use my omnipotence to save his conciousness and store it in the multiverse

Also: Plot twist
